2023.title: A Conversation with Raghuram G. Rajan

Rajan, the Katherine Dusak Miller Distinguished Service Professor of Finance at the University of Chicago's Booth School, who served as the 23rd Governor of the Reserve Bank of India from 2013 to 2016. President Goolsbee will serve as moderator for the discussion being held at the Chicago Fed's Financial Markets Group Fall Conference.

Goolsbee, president and chief executive officer of the Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago, welcomed participants to the Fourth Annual Exploring Career Pathways in Economics and Related Fields Conference on September 7. The event was designed for Black high school and college students to hear from leaders in economics and related fields about their work and career journeys.
